column4: I recently upgraded from hoary hedgehog to breezy badger, and am at a loss as to how I am meant to run a program under a different user. (I want to run evolution as my father's user)
I recently upgraded from hoary hedgehog to breezy badger, and am at a loss as to how I am meant to run a program under a different user.
'sudo' or 'gksu' or ''run as a different user''.
i have tried to do that, and also to use the "run as different user" tool in the "system tools" menu, but neither work.
